snippet: Mets pitcher Johan Santana, recovering from shoulder surgery in 2010, pitched well in his second spring training start.
abstract: New York Mets pitcher Johan Santana, who is recovering from shoulder surgery in 2010, pitches well in spring training game against Miami Marlins; game is called because of rain after five innings with the Marlins leading, 4-2.
lead_paragraph: Mets pitcher Johan Santana, recovering from shoulder surgery in 2010, pitched well in his second spring training start.

headline.main: Santana Remains Sharp in Second Start
headline.print_headline: Santana Remains Sharp in Second Start
